concept.title: What is cross-country skiing about
concept.shortdesc: Short and deep reflection of what's actually the matter of cross-country skiing

conbody.p: The most important thing is that you usually do cross-country skiing in nature. You can see the dark green shadows of coniferous woods, smell them in the breeze which whets your face and makes it red in a somehow icy way. You make your way through these layers of greenish darkness, while you have to exercise your strenght in a continuous rhythmic dance of your limbs from side to side, feeling the discharge of your inner tension while at the same time enjoying the smoothness of the ski sliding under you as if they did it all alone, without intervention of the majesty you. This is skiing. But only part of it. And there are other parts as well.
Like for example playing tag in a skiing arena with your friends.
